text: Falao nkunkweja Yusufu munkokoteni uutângwa na falasi ukatapajîjwe kwajili ya kuikala munu wa nafasi yavili muufalume wake, na valinzi nkulongolela muyo mwanga Yusufu uvanonoha lidi uvachidoni, “Tindivalanga malundi!” Bahi namuna aneyo njo Falao champele Yusufu mamulaka makulu nchilambo chammalele cha Misili.
